THE USO IS THINKING ABOUT SETTING UP SOME DISCUSSION GROUPS OR CLASSES TO HELP SOLDIERS WITH THE PROBLEMS THEY MAY HAVE AFTER THE WAR. THE NEXT FEW QUESTIONS ARE AIMED AT FINDING OUT WHAT SOLDIERS EXPECT TO DO AFTER THE WAR, AND HOW THE USO CAN BEST HELP THEM.
